marquee.strong: Illini West Facilities will be closed the remainder of the school year. Remote learning will continue until the final planned day of school.

a.aria-label: Read more about COVID Closing Info

div.p:
Local Hotspots
Several organizations have graciously allowed for their internet access to be used by students for the purposes of educational opportunity. Please respect their property and any rules they choose to put in place.
These are all parking lot or outside locations and no bathrooms or building facilities will be available at any time to follow COVID 19 restrictions. . . .
